attributes.action: Sustainable Reform - 8 proposals for fundamental changes to British politics
attributes.additional_details:
1 Mental health reform, a preventative approach 
 2 Electoral reform (proportional)
 3 Industrial Reform - Hemp can replace almost every aspect of the oil industry. 
 4 Secular Spiritual Reform (Wellness studies and Education in the nature of the mind)
 5 Energy reform (renewable energy.)
Every human on the planet needs clean air and clean water.
6 Universal Basic Income
7 Gross National Happiness
The collective happiness and well-being
8 Police admissions reform - More psychological testing
attributes.background:
1 Mental health reform. 
 2 Electoral reform. (proportional)
 3 Industrial reform (hemp).
 4  Secular spiritual reform (Wellness studies and Education in the nature of the mind)
 5 Energy reform (renewable energy.)
6 Universal Basic Income
7 Gross National Happiness.
8 Police reform

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do in each of these chases
	
You could start new petitions explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
